p2parser package¶

Submodules¶

class p2parser.splitter.PcapSplitter(pcap_path, exefile_path='PcapSplitter')[source]¶

Bases: object

Split a .pcap file into different files.

split_by_client_ip(dest_path, pkts_bpf_filter='')[source]¶

split files by client IP, meaning all connections with the same client IP will be in the same file.

split_by_count(count_pkts, dest_path, pkts_bpf_filter='')[source]¶

Split files by packet count.

split_by_filter(bpf_filter, dest_path, pkts_bpf_filter='')[source]¶

split file into two files: one that contains all packets matching the given BPF filter (file #0) and one that contains the rest of the packets (file #1).

split_by_ip_src_dst(dest_path, pkts_bpf_filter='')[source]¶

split files by IP src and dst (2-tuple), meaning all connections with the same IPs will be in the same file.

split_by_round_robin(n_files, dest_path, pkts_bpf_filter='')[source]¶

split the file in a round-robin manner - each packet to a different file.

split_by_server_ip(dest_path, pkts_bpf_filter='')[source]¶

split files by server IP, meaning all connections with the same server IP will be in the same file.

split_by_server_port(dest_path, pkts_bpf_filter='')[source]¶

split files by IP src and dst (2-tuple), meaning all connections with the same IPs will be in the same file.

split_by_session(dest_path, pkts_bpf_filter='')[source]¶

split files by connection (5-tuple), meaning all packets of a connection will be in the same file.

split_by_size(size_bytes, dest_path, pkts_bpf_filter='')[source]¶

Split files by size in bytes.

p2parser is a python toolbox for pcap parser
